creator: jm300@tmp.com.br
text:
Our environment consists of apache 2.0.59 + zope 2.7.7 using the mod_proxy and
mod_cache facilities. It was identified that when an image content is changed on
zope but its name remains the same, apache doesn´t honor this change, always
sending the older image to the client. What additional information do I need to
provide?

Thanks for your attention.

creator: takashi.asfbugzilla@tks.st
text:
This does not look like a bug, but it looks like a configuration problem. 
Please try the user support forums first.
<http://httpd.apache.org/docs/trunk/faq/#support.what2do>

mod_cache does not always check whether a file have been modified. This is 
depending on mod_cache's configurations and/or backend outputs.
